snippet.title: Ruinarch Official Trailer
snippet.description:
A wickedly fun evil overlord simulator where you wreak havoc on procedurally-generated fantasy worlds using calamities, afflictions, demons and monsters. If you ever wanted to control the random events in colony simulators like Rimworld and Dwarf Fortress, this is the game for you. 

Wishlist and follow here!
Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/909320/Ruinarch/
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/ruinarch/
Twitter : https://twitter.com/ruinarch_game
Streamer/Press key  request : marvin.apacible@maccima.ph
